comments.name: stretch

comments.html: I though that borderless refered to not dividing the network into cisco layer but using new switching technology that can be implemented anywhere in the network (core, access, wan, distribution, datacenter...) etc
comments.name: nelson

comments.html: The "borderless network" idea has (in my opinion) more to do with the fact that there are no longer "hard" boundaries between inside and outside of an enterprise network due to mobile devices (BlackBerry, iPhone), cloud services (Gmail, Google Docs ...), use of social networking sites for business reasons ...
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
